name: Terraform CI/CD

on:
  pull_request:
    branches: ["main", "dev"]
  push:
    branches: ["main", "dev"]
  workflow_dispatch:
    inputs:
      environment:
        description: "Target environment"
        required: true
        type: choice
        options: [dev, prod]

permissions:
  id-token: write
  contents: read

env:
  AWS_REGION: ${{ vars.AWS_REGION }}

jobs:
  plan:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    # Decide env:
    # - workflow_dispatch: use chosen input
    # - push to dev branch: dev
    # - push to main branch: prod
    # - PR to dev: dev, PR to main: prod
    env:
      TF_ENV: ${{ github.event_name == 'workflow_dispatch' && github.event.inputs.environment || (github.ref_name == 'main' && 'prod' || 'dev') }}

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Configure AWS (OIDC)
        uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v4
        with:
          role-to-assume: ${{ secrets.AWS_ROLE_ARN }}
          aws-region: ${{ env.AWS_REGION }}

      - uses: hashicorp/setup-terraform@v3
        with:
          terraform_version: "1.7.5"

      - name: Terraform Init
        run: terraform init

      - name: Select Workspace
        run: |
          terraform workspace select $TF_ENV || terraform workspace new $TF_ENV

      - name: Terraform Format Check
        run: terraform fmt -check -recursive

      - name: Terraform Validate
        run: terraform validate

      - name: Terraform Plan
        run: terraform plan -var-file="envs/$TF_ENV.tfvars"

  apply_dev:
    needs: plan
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    # Auto-apply only on push to dev (not on PRs)
    if: github.event_name == 'push' && github.ref_name == 'dev'

    environment: dev

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Configure AWS (OIDC)
        uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v4
        with:
          role-to-assume: ${{ secrets.AWS_ROLE_ARN }}
          aws-region: ${{ env.AWS_REGION }}

      - uses: hashicorp/setup-terraform@v3
        with:
          terraform_version: "1.7.5"

      - name: Terraform Init
        run: terraform init

      - name: Select Workspace
        run: |
          terraform workspace select dev || terraform workspace new dev

      - name: Terraform Apply (dev auto)
        run: terraform apply -auto-approve -var-file="envs/dev.tfvars"

  apply_prod:
    needs: plan
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    # Apply prod on push to main OR manual dispatch selecting prod
    if: |
      (github.event_name == 'push' && github.ref_name == 'main') ||
      (github.event_name == 'workflow_dispatch' && github.event.inputs.environment == 'prod')

    # Manual approval gate: require reviewers on prod environment
    environment: prod

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Configure AWS (OIDC)
        uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v4
        with:
          role-to-assume: ${{ secrets.AWS_ROLE_ARN }}
          aws-region: ${{ env.AWS_REGION }}

      - uses: hashicorp/setup-terraform@v3
        with:
          terraform_version: "1.7.5"

      - name: Terraform Init
        run: terraform init

      - name: Select Workspace
        run: |
          terraform workspace select prod || terraform workspace new prod

      - name: Terraform Apply (prod requires approval)
        run: terraform apply -auto-approve -var-file="envs/prod.tfvars"
